channel.title: After An Hour Of Making Shops - ERROR - plz help
channel.description:
Ive just spent over an hour inserting the shops i made into the client ..
When i compile i get no errors, but i get this when i run;
- Project Czar - Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "C loth" .. Online!
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1792) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:28)
Please Help. Im In the very early stages of learning. Im currently half way through "classes" , so dont flame me for asking for help :|
